page.title: 14Why live in South Wakefield
page.content: My family live on Pledwick Lane which is a nice area. Our house is detached with 3 bedrooms and a large garden. We moved here 6 years ago when my father got a job in Wakefield. There is a lot of housing around Wakefield but we chose this area because there is plenty of open countryside around here and it is nice and quiet. Although there are few shops in the area the City Centre is only 3 miles away and they opened a big Asda Super- market a mile away only last year. It is easy to get to the City Centre because plenty of buses run along the main road. Getting to primary school could have been a problem but a special bus picked us up. Now I am at the comprehensive school I can walk on fine days or catch a bus.
